describe.zh_CN: 通过给羽毛笔注魔，可以让魔力环绕在羽毛笔周围，形成魔力羽毛笔。\n将魔力羽毛笔投入岩浆湖或者湖中，会吸收周围的液体与魔力共振，形成火之羽毛笔或水之羽毛笔，不过它们目前的作用甚微。
describe.en_US: By infusing magic into the Quill, it can surround the quill with magic, forming a Magic Quill.\nWhen the Magic Quill is thrown into a magma lake or a lake, it will absorb the surrounding liquid and forming a Fire Quill or a Water Quill, but their current functions are minimal.
